passengers

Class ConcessionPassenger

  • Object
    • Passenger
      • ConcessionPassenger

  • public class ConcessionPassenger
extends Passenger
    A passenger that pays concession fares. Concession fares require a concession id.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConcessionPassenger(String name, Stop destination, int concessionId)
      Construct a new concession fare passenger with the given name and concessionId.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void expire()
      Sets the concession fare to be expired, and thus invalid.
      boolean isValid()
      Returns true if and only if the stored concessionId is valid.
      void renew(int newId)
      Attempts to renew this concession passenger's fares with the given id.

      • Methods inherited from class Passenger

        getDestination, getName, setDestination, toString

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConcessionPassenger

        public ConcessionPassenger(String name,
                           Stop destination,
                           int concessionId)
        Construct a new concession fare passenger with the given name and concessionId.

        Should meet the specification of Passenger.Passenger(String, Stop).

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the passenger.
        destination - The destination of the passenger.
        concessionId - Identifying number of the passenger's concession card.

    • Method Detail

      • expire

        public void expire()
        Sets the concession fare to be expired, and thus invalid. isValid() returns false.

      • renew

        public void renew(int newId)
        Attempts to renew this concession passenger's fares with the given id.
        Parameters:
        newId - The ID of the renewed concession card.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Returns true if and only if the stored concessionId is valid.

        In this transportation network, a valid concessionId begins with the digits '42', should be positive, and should be a minimum of six digits in length (for example, 420000 would be a valid concessionId, while 430000, -420000, or 42000 would not).

        Returns:
        True if concession fares have not expired (are valid), false otherwise.
